## Shape.TopToCorner property

获取和设置形状相对于工作表上边框的垂直偏移量，以像素为单位。

```csharp
public int TopToCorner { get; set; }
```

### 例子

```csharp

[C#]
if (shape.TopToCorner == 3)
    shape.TopToCorner = 1;
```
